Name: Sterope
Details: Sterope, sometimes named New Taurus, is an industrial world located in the rimward Periphery. The planet is home to Sterope Defense Industries as well as corporate unit of Taurus Territorial Industries. Due to its remoteness, the TDF has decided to redeploy its forces to systems closer to the Davion border, leaving Sterope's security to the numerous and well-armed local militias.
